item.description:
This is being listed on the random site so that you can coordinate with others that might be going - if you plan to particpate you must register with "The Four Thousand Footer Club". You can visit their site to get your application and registration information (click here).

=====

Did you finish climbing the 4,000 Footers during the past year? Are you looking to meet and socialize with others that have done the same thing?

If so, then this event is for you.

The dinner and all other functions are open to award recipients (both past and present), their family members and friends, and all other interested parties.

The cost of the dinner is $13 for adults and $7 for children under 13. People who do not wish to attend the dinner are welcome to attend the Awards Presentation and stay to meet with others afterward. A donation of $2 per person is requested to help defray the auditorium rental cost; this can be paid at the door and does not require pre-registration

The Dinner Reservation Form is available online (click here) but must be sent by regular mail.

Please note: This is a school, so no alcoholic beverages may be consumed on the grounds.

==========

Here's the agenda for the event:

  • 4:15 PM .. Doors open to the public
  • 4:30 PM - 5:30 PM .. Social Hour with exhibits by trail maintenance organizations
  • 5:30 PM - 6:30 PM .. Pizza Dinner (vegetarian pizzas will be available) in the cafeteria, with salad, coffee and milk, and chocolate chip cookies for dessert
  • 6:15 PM .. Auditorium opens
  • 6:15 PM - 6:30 PM .. Outdoor Presentation of canine awards (see note on next item)
  • 6:30 PM - 8:00 PM .. Awards Ceremony in the auditorium (Welcome and introductions, announcement of donations, brief talk on trail maintenance, special media presentation, and presentation of awards (to facilitate presentations, please check in at the door if you are receiving an award, as we mark the award envelopes of folks in attendance and do not announce those that are not marked!)
  • 8:00 PM - 9:30 PM .. Further opportunity for socializing

==========

Directions to the Coorperative School

From points North or South:

  • From I-95, take Exit 2 to NH-101 West (toll on ramp)
  • West on NH-101 for 1.2 miles to Exit 12 (NH-111)
  • Turn left (west) on NH-111
  • Bear right at junction with NH-27
  • West on NH-111/NH-27 for 0.7 miles to Guinea Road
  • Right on Guinea Road for 0.4 miles
  • Right onto Academic Way (school driveway)

From points West:

  • Take NH-101 East to Exit 12 (NH-111)
  • Turn right (west) on NH-111
  • Bear right at junction with NH-27
  • West on NH-111/NH-27 for 0.7 miles to Guinea Road
  • Right on Guinea Rd. for 0.4 miles
  • Right onto Academic Way (school driveway)

For the GPS-addicted, the parking lot is at 42°58’55” x 70°54’05”
item.name: Four Thousand Footer Club Annual Meeting and Awards Dinner
